EmailTemplate.name: More information (English)
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr./ Ms. {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for contacting DuPont.
Unfortunately your enquiry did not include enough information for us to provide you with a satisfactory answer.
To send it to the appropriate department
we need a more detailed description on your request
we need to know the application for which you need the product requested
we need to know the name of the product in which you are interested
we need to know your complete contact details (name of the company, telephone number...)
We look forward to receiving your reply.
Best regards,
DuPont Product Information Service EMEA
Toll-free number : 00800 3876 68 38
Phone : 0034 985 12 3773
Fax : 0034 912 72 52 37
E-mail: eu-info@dupont.com
